title: Satya Traditional Ayurveda Incense
description: Traditional Ayurveda Incense Sticks from the Satya Ayurvedic range of incense This incense is from the Shrinivas Sugandhalaya factory where the famous original Satya Sai Baba Nag Champa Incense is produced It is traditionally made from a sandalwood base to which are added a variety of flower oils One 15 gram box
cleaned_text: Traditional Ayurveda Incense Sticks from the Satya Ayurvedic range of incense. This incense is from the Shrinivas Sugandhalaya factory where the famous original Satya Sai Baba Nag Champa Incense is produced. It is traditionally made from a sandalwood base to which are added a variety of flower oils. One 15 gram box. There are currently no product reviews.
